name: Lilttle Man RPG
description:
❓WHAT TO DO IN GAME❓

You can go around looking at other places or go kill monsters and see how much kills u can get.

Fruit & Flags are health items..

JOIN DISCORD 

⚠️WARNING!⚠️

Only way to leave game is Alt+Tab then Right click the game to close it.

ONE AREA IS BROKE SO IF U GET TO A WHITE SCREEN PLEASE RESTART GAME. (WILL FIX SOON.)

⚜HOW TO PLAY⚜

Use W,S,A,D to walk and Left Click to Attack.
